title: Twerk vs. Cha-Cha
itunes:title: Twerk vs. Cha-Cha
description:
TUE 10/18 - The Breakfast Club gets a surprise call from Miss Nicki Minaj! We talk twerk videos, Lauryn Hill, Charlamagne's two-rag wash routine and more! Then Mr. Cha-Cha and Broccoli himself, D.R.A.M., stops by to talk about his new project and how he's rebounded since Drake stole his cha-cha wave.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
